title: Introduction to ANOVABNPTestR
text: First, must fit model. responses take values real line, can use anova_bnp_normal() (see anova_bnp_berpoi() counts anova_bnp_bernoulli() Boolean variables):
code: yvec <- example_01[[c("y")]] Xmat <- example_01[, c("x1", "x2")] |> as.matrix() my_fit <- ANOVABNPTestR::anova_bnp_normal(yvec, Xmat)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Iván Gutiérrez. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Gutiérrez (2024). ANOVABNPTestR: Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://igutierrezm.github.io/ANOVABNPTestR/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ANOVABNPTestR: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA},   author = {Iván Gutiérrez},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://igutierrezm.github.io/ANOVABNPTestR/}, }

title: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA
text: R package implements (BNP) Factorial ANOVA model described Gutiérrez et al. (2024). See documentation details getting started vignette working example.

title: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA
text: can install ANOVABNPTestR source follows: can install Julia dependencies follows: need .

title: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA
text: ANOVABNPTestR requires Julia v1.6.1+. can download . See following link instructions.

what: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel — anova_bnp_bernoulli
title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel — anova_bnp_bernoulli
text: Fit Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model Bernoulli kernel

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel — anova_bnp_bernoulli
code: anova_bnp_bernoulli(   y,   X,   iter = 4000L,   warmup = 2000L,   seed = 1L,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   a2 = 2,   b2 = 4,   lb = min(y),   ub = max(y) )

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel — anova_bnp_bernoulli
text: y boolean response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations. warmup number warmup mcmc iterations. seed seed random number generation. rho hyperparameter \(\rho\). hyperparameter \(\). b hyperparameter \(b\). a2 hyperparameter \(a_2\). b2 hyperparameter \(b_2\).

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel — anova_bnp_bernoulli
text: object class anova_bnp_model.

what: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli-Poisson kernel — anova_bnp_berpoi
title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli-Poisson kernel — anova_bnp_berpoi
text: Fit Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model Bernoulli-Poisson kernel

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli-Poisson kernel — anova_bnp_berpoi
code: anova_bnp_berpoi(   y,   X,   iter = 4000L,   warmup = 2000L,   seed = 1L,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   a1 = 2,   b1 = 4,   alpha0 = 1,   beta0 = 1,   lb = min(y),   ub = max(y) )

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli-Poisson kernel — anova_bnp_berpoi
text: y integer response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations. warmup number warmup mcmc iterations. seed seed random number generation. rho hyperparameter \(\rho\). hyperparameter \(\). b hyperparameter \(b\). a1 hyperparameter \(a_1\). b1 hyperparameter \(b_1\). alpha0 hyperparameter \(\alpha_0\). beta0 hyperparameter \(\beta_0\).

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli-Poisson kernel — anova_bnp_berpoi
text: object class anova_bnp_model.

what: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel — anova_bnp_normal
title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel — anova_bnp_normal
text: Fit Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model Gaussian kernel

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel — anova_bnp_normal
code: anova_bnp_normal(   y,   X,   iter = 4000L,   warmup = 2000L,   seed = 1L,   n = 50L,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   a0 = 2,   lambda0 = 1,   mu0 = 0,   b0 = 1,   lb = mean(y) - 3 * sd(y),   ub = mean(y) + 3 * sd(y),   standardize_y = FALSE )

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel — anova_bnp_normal
text: y continuous response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations. warmup number warmup mcmc iterations. seed seed random number generation. n number points \(y_0\) computing \(p(y_0 | y)\). final grid conformed n equispaced points lb ub, see arguments lb ub. rho hyperparameter \(\rho\). hyperparameter \(\). b hyperparameter \(b\). a0 hyperparameter \(a_0\). lambda0 hyperparameter \(\lambda_0\). mu0 hyperparameter \(\mu_0\). b0 hyperparameter \(b_0\). lb lower bound prediction grid. ub upper bound prediction grid. standardize_y Select TRUE internally standardize data, fit model, present results original scale.

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel — anova_bnp_normal
text: object class anova_bnp_model.
